about_text: Hi! I'm Emirhan, a passionate software developer who loves building user-friendly, scalable, and high-performance web applications using modern technologies. I mainly focus on backend development with .NET, while also creating powerful frontend interfaces using React and Redux. I value clean code, continuous learning, and exploring new technologies in the software world. In my free time, I enjoy developing personal projects, sharing my work on GitHub, and constantly improving my skills.
